sources.title: "The Message Of The Violin" (1910) director D. W. Griffith cinematographer Billy Bitzer
sources.description: This gem is presented by Silent Hall of Fame.   Please visit https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/   to support our non-profit mission and the legacy of silent movie stars by making a tax deductible contribution.   FEEL FREE TO FOLLOW US ON TWITTER @SilentFilmGems     This is a short preview. You can watch the whole film here: https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/index.php/gems-for-donation   "The Message of the Violin" is a short drama. The film is included in our program to illustrate the work of Billy Bitzer, a star of Silent Hall of Fame. A girl's family suddenly becomes rich and rejects her long-time sweetheart. Directed by                       D.W. Griffith Cinematography by         Billy Bitzer Starring                             Charles West, Stephanie Longfellow, Dell Henderson Distributed by                   Biograph Company Release date                      October 24, 1910 Country                             United States Running time                    13 m.   Copyright Disclaimer Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976: "Allowance is made for "fair use" for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship, and research.
